transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ya, Namaskar sir, Rajeev ji baat kar rahe hain Dauji Agro se?
Customer: Ji, Namaskar ji.
Executive: Ji sir, main Hardin bol raha tha IndiaMART se account manager. Maine service ke feedback ke regarding call kiya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aapne sir abhi matlab kuch complaint bhi aa rahi hai sir aapki?
Customer: Haan, woh lead ka problem tha. Woh lead ka thoda sa kara do. Aati nahi hai, aati hai beech mein fir band ho jati hai.
Executive: Lead nahi aa rahi? Abhi sir aapko, achha main abhi dekh lu jara, kis lead ki aap baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ab beech mein toh lead kaafi kam thi.
Executive: Hmm, main dekh leta hu jara chart open karke. Toh sir, calls ya enquiry ki baat kar rahe hain ya matlab buylead ki aap baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Calls toh aayi nahi hai, calls toh, calls toh aayi nahi hai. Ek aadhi aayi ho toh.
Executive: November mein sir aapke paas teen call aayi hain, October mein nahi aayi.
Customer: Haan, wohi toh keh raha hu. Yeh batao pura complete October mein jab nahi aayi, November mein teen call aayi hain, batao. Per day do-teen calling ke liye bola tha. Yani ki ab sir toh kam se kam 70-80 apne ko call honi chahiye thi. Kahan teen call hai? Toh sahi kahan calling?
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Enquiry ki agar main baat karu toh aapke sir November mein 45 enquiry aayi hain.
Customer: Haan, wohi toh keh raha hu us hisab se kam hai na fir bhi. Unme se aadhe se jyada toh dealer hote hain, koi phone band kar dete hain. Kuch aise hote hain.
Executive: Dekh raha hu sir abhi kya issue aa raha hai.
Executive: Dauji Agro, Palwal.
Executive: Clay mixture machine. Aapke basically isme yeh hai.
Executive: Category map hai. Kuch categories map hai.
Executive: Do product inactive ho chuke hain. Yeh mild steel induced draft fans aur yeh plug pug mill, pug mill. Iski sir, yeh do product aapke na deactivate ho rakhe hain. Toh aapko pata hai sir yeh baat?
Customer: Ek toh mild steel induced draft fans?
Customer: Nahi, maine toh nahi kiye. Koi ab pata nahi kaun karta hai inko.
Executive: Achha, yeh, yeh photo contains personal info, mobile, email etcetera. Isme jo aapne photo upload kiya hai na,
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeh induced draft wale mein, draft fan jo hai. Isme mobile number aur matlab kuch woh cheez show kar raha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jaise Dauji Agro aur yeh matlab aapka mobile number wagera show kar raha hai.
Customer: Toh isko kar do.
Executive: Woh bhi tum woh na kuch na kuch jo bhi issue hai aap usko karo theek.
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello, aawaz nahi aa rahi sir. Ab aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Haan, woh aa rahi hai.
Customer: Woh sir aati hai woh wifi ka thoda issue hai. Waise yeh keh raha tha isme jo photos hai ek toh pug mill hai na, isme jo rejection ka jo reason hai na, woh jo photo hai usme mobile number pada hua hai aapka. Hai na? Aur Dauji Agro Electric Price, yeh toh khair theek hai lekin isme mobile number photo mein pada hua hai is wajah se reject kar diya hai.
Customer: Ab isko karo na theek. Mujhe toh idea nahi hai kuch bhi jaise bhi.
Executive: Haan, isme sir photo, abhi sir aapke paas koi hoga?
Customer: Induced draft fan ka?
Executive: Haan, iska, yeh pug mill, pug mill aur induced draft fan.
Customer: Theek hai, main deta hu. Pug mill ke dono ko mujhe WhatsApp pe high likh ke bhejo, main abhi deta hu.
Executive: Haan, abhi sir line pe hi rahiye woh, main abhi aapko high bhejta hu.
Executive: Sir maine aapko WhatsApp pe high bheja hai aur sir aapki jo aap photo do na usme yeh dekhna ki usme mobile aur naam number wagera na ho.
Customer: Theek hai. Photo bhej do, send kar raha hu main aapko.
Executive: Haan, photo share karo aur sir aap buylead ke jiske bare mein baat kar rahe ho, aap buylead wagera consume kar rahe ho sir?
Customer: Haan, karta hu, daily karta hu. Jab nahi hoti hai toh main kya consume karunga? Jab hogi nahi toh.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Toh jaise aapke jo matlab kaam ki nahi hoti woh sab not relevant mark karte ho?
Customer: Nahi, usko toh main kuch nahi karta. Main toh jo apne kaam ki hai woh uthata hu bas. Not relevant mein kya hota hai? Fir yeh bolte hain ki aapne not relevant kar diya toh woh ya toh main kuch karta hi nahi hu unka toh.
Executive: Woh toh sir jaise jis category ki suppose aap galat category ki aa rahi hai toh usme agar aap karenge toh sir aapko benefit hi hai na isko pata rahega system ko ke aapne matlab is category ki aap.
Customer: Woh category sir jo lead aati hai na woh not relevant karne se woh band ho jati hai nahi sahi bhi.
Executive: Hmm. Koi category galat lead wagera toh nahi aa rahi aapko?
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Koi galat lead toh nahi aa rahi aapko?
Customer: Nahi, galat lead nahi aa rahi. Galat lead bhi aa jaye toh galat lead ka matlab yeh hota hai koi bhi dal deta hai. Koi bole main toh general dekh raha tha woh galat lead thodi hai. Theek hai kuch na kuch toh search kiya tha usne.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Photo toh save and continue.
Executive: Agar jaise koi matlab aisi lead ho jo ki aapke kaam ki na ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Matlab product hi bilkul galat hai. Kisi aur product ki aa rahi hai jo ki isme aap deal nahi karte.
Customer: Toh main uthata hi nahi hu na main unko.
Executive: Uthate nahi hai aur sir isko na agar jaise aapke agar kaam ki nahi hai usko agar deactivate woh aap karenge na jaise not relevant toh usme sir aapko us tarike dikhana band kar dega fir. Aur jo aapke liye kaam ki hoti hai na usko, abhi sir aapko na yeh activate khud se karna padega yeh. Kyunki mere end se yahan pe nahi hoga yeh. Toh aap mere ko video meet pe aa jaise aap agar available ho toh video meet pe aap mere ko time de do.
Customer: Theek hai ji, theek hai ji. Video meet pe aata hu thodi der mein.
Executive: Theek hai sir, aap call kar lena mere ko.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Customer's two products are deactivated.

- Customer's photos contain personal information.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account details.

- Executive informed about deactivated products.

- Executive explained the reason for photo rejection.

- Executive asked the customer to send new photos.

- Executive explained the importance of marking leads.

- Executive asked to join a video meet to activate products.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send new photos on WhatsApp.

- Customer will join a video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, deactivated products, photo rejection, video meet
